title: League of Legends does not load at all.
body:
Alright. When I load league of Legends the logo comes up, and then it just goes blank and the launcher never appears. When I try to load it again it says an instance of it is already running but it isn't.

I have uninstalled and reinstalled heaps and it does nothing, I've tried playing it off a harddrive and still nothing. Any thoughts?

replies.body:
Try running your game as administrator;

Right-Click on the League of Legends shortcut
Select Run as Administrator
---
If that doesn't help, make sure your firewall is set up properly to allow League. You can also try temporarily disabling it.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#section-windows
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=1k0AafEm,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-06T15:27:12.593+0000)
>
> Try running your game as administrator;
> 
> Right-Click on the League of Legends shortcut
> Select Run as Administrator
> ---
> If that doesn't help, make sure your firewall is set up properly to allow League. You can also try temporarily disabling it.
> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#section-windows
> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

Doesn't work.
Could you go into your League folder and try running the **lol.launcher.admin**? (the default that is run is the *lol.launcher* one)

Please don't link me that RADS solution because it doesn't work at all for me.

The launcher tries to load then just doesn't appear.
